core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Rose Gold Luxury mixed with Gen Z Internet Humor.
Emotion First: The journey from 'Curiosity' to 'Frustration' (running button) to 'Joy' (Celebration).
Content is King: The 'Dubai Kidnap' joke is the narrative anchor.
Negative Space: Don't clutter. Let the question breathe.

headings.instructions: Use for 'Will you be my Valentine?' and 'Minnu'. Make it elegant but massive (text-5xl md:text-7xl).

body.instructions: Round, friendly, and readable. Matches the 'playful' vibe.

layout.grid_system: Single Page Flow (Centering Allowed for this specific use case as it is a focus-driven landing page)
layout.spacing: Generous padding (p-8 to p-12) to frame the question.

no_button.style: ghost or outline, smaller than Yes button
no_button.behavior: RUNAWAY LOGIC: On hover/touch, moves to random coordinate within viewport. Must NEVER be clickable.

visual_enhancers.floating_hearts: Background particle system of SVG hearts floating upward.
visual_enhancers.dubai_card: A polaroid-style card revealing the 'Dubai Plan' after she says Yes.

animations.entrance: FadeInUp with staggerChildren for text lines.
animations.runaway: Spring transition for the 'No' button movement (type: 'spring', stiffness: 300).

cute_reaction.usage: Use if she tries to click 'No' too many times (if you can even catch it)

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. Structure: Create a Main Container that centers content but allows the 'No' button to roam freely within the viewport.
3. Logic: The 'No' button must have 'position: fixed' or 'absolute' when it starts moving to ensure it doesn't break layout flow.
4. Mobile: Ensure the 'No' button doesn't go off-screen on mobile. Calculate viewport bounds.
5. Sound: Use a free joyful sound effect on 'Yes' click if possible (or just visual noise).
6. Inside Joke: After 'Yes', show a card saying 'Pack your bags, we are going to Dubai! (Just kidding... unless?)' with the Dubai image.
7. Emoji: Use the üôÑ emoji as a recurring motif in the background or as a reaction.
universal_guidelines: Use 'framer-motion' for all entrance and interaction animations.
Ensure high contrast for text over the rose gold background.
Do not use default Shadcn buttons without heavy customization (roundness, shadow).
Add 'data-testid' to the Yes/No buttons for testing.
